mapper.select: insert into organizations (short_name, name, organization_opf, organization_type, ogrn, inn, activity_started_at, activity_finished_at, created_at) values (#{shortName}, #{name}, #{organizationOPF}, #{organizationType}, #{ogrn}, #{inn}, #{activityStartedAt}, #{activityFinishedAt},NOW()) RETURNING id;
mapper.delete: update organizations set deleted_at = NOW() WHERE 1 = 1 AND id = #{organizationId}
